html:
1.9.24  11:12 am   do you dislike putting labels on people or categorizing them?

      in some ways yes, in other ways no

1.9.24  11:10 am   would you like some honey roasted peanuts

      not right now

1.9.24  10:04 am   Did music exist before humans existed? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.9.24  7:53 am   Pick a card

      the info card

1.9.24  7:20 am   Are you still making songs in order of length or is that no longer in place?

      i only did that experiment in 2013 and 2015

1.9.24  5:16 am   When do you decide to personally show up in your videos versus having only animation?

      when i think it suits the song

1.9.24  4:59 am   do you like to have limitations when recording a song?

     yes

     like to make things simple, or do you like to have everything you can think of at disposition? 

      i don't know what you mean by disposition, but having too many options is a famous problem for production

1.9.24  4:38 am   What is your favorite way an egg is cooked? 

      obliterated

1.9.24  3:29 am   hoe gaat het?

      goed

1.9.24  2:11 am   Hey Bill could you include the word 'the' in one of your next songs as a little nod to me? Thanks for considering

      answering this question is a nod to you, but inclusion of the word 'the' in a song title is not. this is something that is likely to happen regardless

1.9.24  2:09 am   do you think humans are meant to go to space?

      seems likely, considering our prior record of expansion

1.9.24  1:14 am   how do i sleep

      i have no idea

1.9.24  12:05 am   do i confront my enemies or let them get away with their crimes

      that all depends on what your own crimes are

1.8.24  11:49 pm   How do you like your eggs?

      i don't have eggs

1.8.24  11:40 pm   do you think anything can be art? by that I mean: do you think that any conceivable thing or concept can be art just by its own nature, or do we happen to ascribe the term "art" to anything we want so it doesn't matter? maybe it does matter. maybe it's both??

      if ascribing these terms 'correctly' seems confusing, that doesn't surprise me. and it doesn't stop me from trying to evoke genuine 'wow' feelings. and if those conditions seem impossible to define, again it doesn't surprise me and it might even be the main reason it's so much fun and so powerful if it ever does work

1.8.24  10:47 pm   If the brain works the body are we the brain or is the brain us?

      if the piano key works the piano, are we the piano key or is the piano key us?

1.8.24  9:13 pm   do you listen to punk music? you should

      one of the core definitions of 'punk' culture, if i recall correctly, is to not do what you're told you should do

1.8.24  8:00 pm   do you like mondays?

      yes

1.8.24  7:54 pm   can I go on the ground plane

      sure

1.8.24  7:29 pm   In the song "I just did a bad thing", at the beginning where it says "bad foot tap", what's bad about it? Is the foot bad? Is the tapping bad? Or both? 

      the theme of the song, at least up to that point, is things being bad

1.8.24  5:35 pm   bill, how do you feel about flowers 

      very pragmatic

1.8.24  5:01 pm   Why do you think "good question" is an existing recognizable phrase but "bad question" isn't?

     it's like when someone flips a coin and it's heads not tails

     Are we just that likely to be more complimentary in conversation?

     not exactly

1.8.24  4:50 pm   Whats your favourite icecream flavour

      i don't recall

1.8.24  3:45 pm   what is a good 3D object?

      a ball

1.8.24  3:08 pm   opinion on wasps..?

     they're ok

     also i enjoy the way you function as a human being and the way your mind works is very complexing. neat

1.8.24  1:26 pm   are "school", "new cannan", and "we could just get high" a trilogy?

      no

1.8.24  1:10 pm   Journal. Will you?

      yes

1.8.24  1:07 pm   What's your ethic?

      we've all been each other before, or will be, or at least could have been, or could be

1.8.24  12:39 pm   do a flip

      i am already in the middle of a flip

1.8.24  11:26 am   can you believe it's not butter

      yes

1.8.24  11:09 am   how many people/instruments would be required to perform one of your songs, where all the parts are not pre-recorded? for example here comes the sun

      you can do it with any number of people you want. if i were doing something like that i think i'd prefer about 7

1.8.24  11:08 am   you make very complicated music with a lot going on in them while punk music is much more raw and straightforward.

     i don't necessarily agree with that thesis

     what do you think of punk rock music?

     like most genre lables, its understood meaning has been significantly bent over time, so it's hard to seriously know what someone is talking about when they use the term

      will you ever make a punk rock song?

      sure, but my use of that genre label might be different from yours at that time

1.8.24  11:06 am   second favourite classical composer?

      i think you're thinking of potato chips

1.8.24  11:06 am   are you ever a character in your script videos or music videos?

     maybe in some ways

     for example, "i'm a huge gamer most of the time", is that a character or is it you?

     it's me who wrote and produced the song and video

1.8.24  10:52 am   I am autistic. Do yuo know how to calm people down in a mental crisis.

     sometimes yes i do

     also, hey bill.

1.8.24  10:22 am   do you ever answer these questions normally

      yes

1.8.24  9:33 am   What is my name

      it's either Elvis or something else

1.8.24  8:44 am   if two people are looking at the sky at different locations, are they looking at the same sky or different sky

      if they are far enough away it is a different sky

1.8.24  7:41 am   Best way to conquer Serbia

      the easy way is to rename another nation to 'Serbia' and rename the current serbia as something else

1.8.24  7:09 am   have you seen any goths lately

      no

1.8.24  3:17 am   Is 'the ending' about music school?

      not for me, but for you it can be, if necessary

1.8.24  3:11 am   Who will be the best rapper in 2030

      could be you

1.8.24  2:18 am   Would you consider the genre of your music to be some form of jazz?

     no

     (I like how you evade classification though)

1.8.24  1:58 am   do you think words are cool

      yes i do

1.8.24  1:51 am   thoughts on fonts?

     they're good

     your music reminds me of papyrus font :)

1.8.24  12:51 am   if you could make the world adopt a new calendar system, what would you change?

      just make it all tuesdays

1.7.24  9:20 pm   why aren't there pink clothes in the men's section at most clothing stores?

      because you bought them all. nevermind that's true, they are still there. i might have bought some

1.7.24  9:12 pm   what is it about mixing that makes it so complicated?

      nothing. but i will admit, thinking it's complicated will make it seem complicated

1.7.24  9:02 pm   Opinions on Cheese

      seems fake

1.7.24  8:16 pm   Why is caring seen as uncool

      maybe it's being done in an uncool way
